remarks: The scalar sigma map is a one-to-one onto function.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hgmapf1o.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hgmapf1o.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapf1o.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hgmapf1o.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hgmapf1o.g $e |- G = ( ( HGMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hgmapf1o.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hgmapf1oN $p |- ( ph -> G : B -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
